import sys

def main():
  for (n, piles) in testcases():
    moves = 0
    for i in xrange(n):
      moves += piles[i] // (i+1)

    if moves & 1:
      print "ALICE"
    else:
      print "BOB"

def testcases(cin = sys.stdin):
  t = int(cin.next())

  for _ in xrange(t):
    n = int(cin.next())
    piles = map(int, cin.next().split())
    yield (n, piles)

if __name__ == "__main__": sys.exit(main())
